SingalData.heroHeading: Complicated is Outdated. Swiss Tax Returns Made Simple.
SingalData.heroDesc: Create your Swiss tax return in less than 10 minutes
SingalData.testimonialDesc: Join a community of over 6'000 like-minded individuals who have already submitted their 2019 tax returns with Taxly.
SingalData.TaxlyWorkNote: Swiss Tax Returns In Just 4 Steps
SingalData.TaxlyWorkDesc: Roger is your virtual AI tax assistant. He’ll connect up the dots in your life, analyse your data, and optimize your return in real time down to the penny.
SingalData.TaxlyWorkBtnText: Additional Support - Our In-House Swiss Tax Advisors Are On Hand
SingalData.TaxlyWorkBtnDesc: Not every tax situation is the same and we can adapt to your needs. Whenever you need help, one of our Swiss tax advisors will be there to support you. Step by step until the finished tax return.
SingalData.BenefitTaxlyDesc: Taxly offers its services to all residents of Switzerland, regardless of your income or nationality.
SingalData.smartPricingDesc: We strive for the most competitive prices in Switzerland and thanks to our smart technology, you can create your tax return at an unprecedented price. Examples below.
SingalData.PaymentOptions: Payment Options: Twint, PayPal, Credit Card, Payment By Invoice
SingalData.yourBusinessTitle: We Want To Help Your Business
SingalData.yourBusinessDesc: Taxly wants to help small businesses in their time of need with special prices for Small Medium Sized Businesses who have been affected by COVID-19.
SingalData.safeHandDesc: Brought to you by a team of Swiss tax experts and technologists who care deeply about protecting you and your data.
SingalData.appTitle: Our mobile app for iOS and Android will be available soon
SingalData.appDesc: Interested? We can keep you up to date.

data.title: Intuitive workflow and great customer support!
data.description: Intuitive workflow and great customer support! Totally recommend it. Never thought my tax declaration would be such a pleasant experience! Merci Taxly!
data.name: Andy Grayshon

data.title: Taxes made simple!
data.description: So easy to navigate and quick & the team is very reactive for any question. Highly recommend!
data.name: Anna Blomkvist

data.title: Very friendly service!
data.description: Very friendly service that allows the filing of personal income taxes transparently. The value is in the last mile before the taxpayers and Taxly got it perfectly.
data.name: Helena Boada

SingalData.actiOneP1Text: Taxly is an online service which allows you to quickly and easily create an optimised tax return.
